content: **knitted slippers with rib and garter stitch for baby in drops merino extra fine size 0 - 4 years** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-070-by yarn group b --------------------------------------------------------- **size** 0/1 - 1/3 - 6/9 - 12/18 months 2 - 3/4 years to fit foot length 9-10-11-12 14-16 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50-50-50-100 100-100 g colour 08 light beige 50-50-50-50 50-50 g colour no 37 misty forest **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm for stocking stitch and garter stitch drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm for rib needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to a larger needle size if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to a smaller needle size
